salesforce.title: Salesforce Journey
salesforce.text: Since 2020, we have been leading the Salesforce Journey, a YouTube channel created to share our knowledge on this platform. We create content with the aim of learning more and more and disseminating features of the number 1 CRM on the market.

flux.title: Flux
flux.text: Flux is a modern and simplified system for restaurants, 100% online. It has product management, payments, withdrawals, cash front and reports, focusing on sales and billing. Product developed by DS4 Tech in operation since 2018.
